actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the uniform allowances available to Federal employees.

summary.text: Increases the allowances available to Federal employees for uniforms required by their positions to $300 for acquisition and $200 for annual maintenance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to increase the uniform allowances available to Federal employees.
